subject: fix(import): rename JSON format "arcs" to "connections", add property type coercion
body:
Three user-facing fixes:

1. JSON export/import format uses "connections" instead of "arcs" — matches
   the terminology used everywhere else in the UI and documentation.

2. Property type coercion on save — numbers, booleans, and JSON arrays/objects
   typed into text inputs are preserved as their correct types instead of being
   stored as strings. Critical for boolean logic, calculations, and timeline
   date-based sorting.

3. Terminology cleanup: "Select a node or arc" → "Select an item",
   "Untitled Arc" → "Untitled Connection".

Also removes CSV from the AI research output guide since CSV import was never
wired up and markdown/JSON cover all use cases (CSV can't express connections).
